## Which Mod?

Better Graze.

## What Happened?

Civilians are still affected.

## How to Reproduce?

1. Join a heist.
1. Aim at a civilian.
1. Fire.

## Expected Result

The civilian is still alive. 

## Actual Result

The civilian is killed.
